head.title: MATTEL REACHES AGREEMENT FOR RIGHTS TO DISNEY TOYS

hedline.hl1: MATTEL REACHES AGREEMENT FOR RIGHTS TO DISNEY TOYS

block.p: The Walt Disney Company's consumer products division said yesterday that it had signed an agreement guaranteeing Mattel Inc. worldwide toy rights for all coming Disney television and film properties. The pact expands the two companies' current relationship, under which Mattel, based in El Segundo, Calif., has provided infant and preschool toys based on Disney characters. The expanded alliance will cover all productions of Walt Disney Pictures, Hollywood Pictures and Touchstone Pictures.
